name: Heighten
description:
This is a Train Jam 2016 game!

Drive a vehicle around picking up blocks and see how many you can pile up before it falls down. It's not as easy as it looks!

It's inspired by the the Train Jam 2016 theme Maximum Capacity, and continues my Train Jam theme of learning to use a new game engine by building a physics game.

Credits

Design, Programming and Art

Mikayla ' mhutch' Hutchinson (@mjhutchinson)

Music and Sound

Logan Hayes (@dynamix_audio)

Source

Full source code is available on GitHub.
